Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia and her husband Carlos have been advocating for immigrant rights in Denver for years and bravely sharing their family’s story. This weekend they’re sel...ling pupusas, which are incredibly popular in El Salvador, Carlos’ home country, and in Salvadoran & Honduran communities across the U.S. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: Jeanette Vizguerra Ingrid Ivett Encalada
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra Ingrid Ivett Encalada

President Biden wants Congress to send him a bill with a path to citizenship for people here illegally, though that may not apply to people in sanctuary in Colorado.

9news.com

Biden's proposed changes to immigration policy may not change much for people in sanctuary

President Biden wants Congress to send him a bill with a path to citizenship for people here illegally, though that may not apply to people in sanctuary in Colorado.President Biden wants Congress to send him a bill with a path to citizenship for people here illegally, though that may not apply to people in sanctuary in Colorado.

item.title: Share please
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Share please

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling pupusas for pickup on the 23rd in Denver & Boulder! She’s a mom to two children and is fighting to keep her family together, along with all ...families impacted by the violent U.S. immigration system. One way you can support is by ordering her food & sharing her story. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

See More
